parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided post.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>False. The post does not refer to any specific parliamentary candidate.  It focuses on the activities of "Partidul Câmpina Curată" related to environmental cleanup in Câmpina.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. The post is a paid Facebook advertisement, inherently designed to reach a wide audience. The message is not directed at specific individuals but promotes the party's environmental initiatives to the public.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>False. While the post is from a political party, its primary objective is not to directly influence votes in the parliamentary elections. The content focuses on a local environmental project, showcasing the party's community engagement. There is no explicit call to vote for the party in this context.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>Potentially True. The post could be considered a form of citizen journalism, documenting the party's community work. It informs the public about their activities and promotes transparency. However, the promotional aspect blurs the line somewhat.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>False. The post doesn't express personal opinions; it presents factual information about a specific event organized by the party.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>888762876437138</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, while originating from a political party, does not constitute electoral propaganda under Article 98 t) of LEGE nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015.  The post focuses on a local environmental initiative, showcasing community engagement rather than directly advocating for votes in the parliamentary elections.  The lack of any explicit or implicit call to vote for the party, combined with the focus on a non-election-related activity, makes it unlikely to influence the outcome of the parliamentary elections.  While the post is promotional in nature, its primary objective appears to be community outreach and positive image building, not electoral campaigning.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>FALSE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates/>
<responsible-party-or-group>Partidul Câmpina Curată</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police/>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
